channel.title: Scrapbook on 아겔로그
channel.description: Recent content in Scrapbook on 아겔로그

item.title: "Some Engineering Tough Sells"
item.description: https://posco.dev/blog/2022-04-23_draft_some-engineering-tough-sells/ …공감이 가는 부분들은: dynamic serialization isn’t worth it, use statically defined serialization untested code is virtually always somewhat wrong doing things right pays off sooner than we usually imagine an ounce of design is worth a pound of implementation in data engineering, the data very often violates your beliefs about the shape thinking about, and minimizing edges in your code’s dependency graph is a win a good (i.e. programmable, fast, reliable, reproducible) build system solves a lot of practical software engineering problems …많은것들을 경험하되, 숙고와 자기객관화는 중요.
